Description
Gets the list of apps installed into a course
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Description
courseId number Canvas course Id to query
excludeParents boolean <optional>
 If true, excludes tools installed in all accounts above the current context
Returns
list of external tools https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/external_tools.html

add( options ) → {Promise.<Object>}

Description
Adds an LTI app to a Canvas course
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Description
courseId number Canvas course Id to install into
name string The app name (for settings app list)
key string Installation consumer key
secret string Installation consumer secret
xml string XML configuration file, standard LTI format
description string <optional>
 A human-readable description of the app
launchPrivacy string <optional>
 'public' by default
Returns
Canvas external tool https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/external_tools.html#method.external_tools.show

Course/App.js, line 119

getMetadata( options ) → {Promise.<Object>}

Description
Gets the metadata for an LTI app in a course. Note: this endpoint requires that the app have a custom parameter called 'metadataId' with an identifier that we will use to refer to the metadata. If each installation of an app will have its own metadata, each installation should have a different metadataId. If all installations share the same metadata, they should all have the same metadataId. When getting metadata, we return the metadata for the first app we find that has this metadataId
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Description
courseId number Canvas course Id that holds the app
metadataId number metadata identifier (see endpoint description)
Returns
Canvas external tool https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/external_tools.html#method.external_tools.show
Details

Gabriel Abrams

Course/App.js, line 143

updateMetadata( options ) → {Promise.<Array.<Object>>}

Description
Updates the metadata for an LTI app in a course. Note: this endpoint requires that the app have a custom parameter called 'metadataId' with an identifier that we will use to refer to the metadata. If each installation of an app will have its own metadata, each installation should have a different metadataId. If all installations share the same metadata, they should all have the same metadataId. When updating metadata, we update the metadata for all apps with the given metadataId
Parameters
Name Type Description
options object object containing all arguments
Name Type Attributes Default Description
courseId number Canvas course Id that holds the app
metadataId number metadata identifier (see endpoint description)
metadata object <optional>
 {} json metadata object
Returns
Array of external tools (the apps that were updated) https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/external_tools.html#method.external_tools.show
Details

Gabriel Abrams
